title: Lady Gaga, Beyonce, Taylor Swift lead all star 'One World: Together at Home' global event - Entertainment Weekly
description:

content:
Hollywood banded together for a tribute to healthcare workers and first responders working to fight the COVID-19 pandemic as part of the One World: Together at Homeglobal event on Saturday.
